1. Story

#The Blox are coming. Get them before they get you!

2. How to play

#Press any key to begin.
#User the left and right arrows to control your paddle and make sure you don't let that ball fall!
#Destroy all the blocks to advance to the next level.
#Enjoy!

3. Level editor

#Design your own levels for Blox!
#How to use goes here

4. About
